term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - measurement resolution, in atmospheric trace component analysis
term.title: measurement resolution

item.text: The minimum value above which the difference of two values of air quality characteristic can be distinguished with 95% probability.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2201 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
